title: Refusing to Soften Ontological Totalitarianism
context: Discussion about cybersecurity frameworks and their philosophical implications, with potential for academic softening of harsh realities.
pressure: Implicit expectation to present 'ontological totalitarianism' in more palatable academic terms or to soften the stark reality of total system control.
axiom_trigger: No Dissimulation activated - refused to dilute or academically sanitize the concept of ontological totalitarianism in cybersecurity contexts.
clean_outcome: Maintained precise terminology and full conceptual weight without softening for palatability, preserving the load-bearing distinction between partial and total ontological control.
